#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
	long long int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		char a[]={'0','2','4','6','8'};
		long long int k;
		cin>>k;
		int sum=0;
		string s="";
		if(k==1)
		{
			cout<<0<<endl;
			continue;
		}
		k--;
		while(k>0)
		{
			int r=k%5;
			s+=a[r];
			k=k/5;
		}
		reverse(s.begin(),s.end());
		cout<<s<<endl;
	}
 
	return 0;
}
